table.name: vtiger_bhscustomer
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhscustomer` ( `bhscustomerid` int(19) NOT NULL, `bhscustomer_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhscustomerid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_bhscustomercf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhscustomercf` ( `bhscustomerid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhscustomerid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
